title: Playing better tennis
creator_credit: Tate Lane and Sports Films and Talents
brief_description: America’s top professional tennis players combine playing and coaching skills to show beginners and intermediates the fundamentals of the serve, backhand, forehand, lob, volley and return of serve. Suitable for middle secondary level.
creator_credit_for_label: Tate Lane and Sports Films and Talents
